creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd in memory of her father, Mr. Thomas Shevlin
description: Rectangular faience platter, with corners clipped, forming irregular octagon; inside edge and rim of central area decorated with orientalized lambrequin pattern; patterns are outlined in fine black lines and filled with blue in varying thicknesses, causing the appearance of a range of colors; central motif of basket filled with stylized flowers
title: Platter
